articles.title: Rümeysa Öztürk can return to research at Tufts after judge orders reinstatement of student immigration record
articles.description:
In a preliminary injunction, a federal judge agreed that the termination of Rümeysa Öztürk's SEVIS record was likely unlawful and ordered its restoration.

The post Rümeysa Öztürk can return to research at Tufts after judge orders reinstatement of student immigration record appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Rümeysa Öztürk can return to research at Tufts aft

articles.title: Bruins rally to beat Blues 5-2 with two goals each from Kastelic and Minten
articles.description:
Pavel Zacha scored an empty-net goal, while David Pastrnak had two assists in his first game since Nov. 16 after missing five games with an undisclosed injury.

The post Bruins rally to beat Blues 5-2 with two goals each from Kastelic and Minten appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Bruins rally to beat Blues 5-2 with two goals each
